description:
As an Activations Go-To-Market Manager, you will work closely with leadership to manage our quarterly Activation process. You will manage the quarterly process, developing shared activation OKRs across regions, programs, and teams and leading executive review forums to provide visibility into progress, top issues and strategic shifts needed to meet the changing needs of our business.

At YouTube, we believe that everyone deserves to have a voice, and that the world is a better place when we listen, share, and build community through our stories. We work together to give everyone the power to share their story, explore what they love, and connect with one another in the process. Working at the intersection of cutting-edge technology and boundless creativity, we move at the speed of culture with a shared goal to show people the world. We explore new ideas, solve real problems, and have fun — and we do it all together.
eeo: At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.
qualifications:
Minimum qualifications:

  • BA/BS degree or equivalent practical experience
  • 5 years of project management experience in management consulting and/or sales operations within internet/media.
  • Experience with structuring compelling storylines and building presentation decks.

Preferred qualifications:

  • MBA or a graduate degree in a management or technical field.
  • Strategic consulting, sales support, and market research experience.
  • Ability to present to executives and communicate with management teams.
  • Effective influencing skills across teams. Developed interpersonal skills that enable you to collaborate effectively with a broad set of stakeholders.
  • Distinctive problem solving and analytical skills.
  • Demonstrated written and verbal communication skills.
responsibilities:
• Build consensus among cross-functional stakeholders to ensure commitment to activate against key objectives and KPIs including Watch Time, Daily Engaged Creators, Revenue and more.
  • Refine and optimize the process of achieving alignment across Product and Business organizations.
  • Forecast partnerships quarterly outreach/support capacity and align OKRs to maximize available resources across partner-facing teams.
  • Lead review forums to help senior executives understand activation progress, business challenges and opportunities, and influence them to align around decisions and actions.
  • Track progress of and grade annual and quarterly OKRs.
title: Activation Go-To-Market Manager, YouTube
